alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kalamazoo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun and eastern Kalamazoo Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 314 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Burlington, or 10 miles south of Battle Creek, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Albion... Marshall... Battle Creek... Vicksburg... Galesburg... Homer... Union City... Climax... Burlington... Kalamazoo-Battle Cre... Brownlee Park... Comstock Northwest... Level Park-Oak Park... Fulton... Marengo... Athens... Augusta... Tekonsha... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
